  1. org.jscience.measure
  2. Quantity

Uses of Interface
org.jscience.measure.Quantity

Packages that use Quantity
Package
Description
org.jscience.measure
Provides units and measures for physical quantities with dimensional analysis.
org.jscience.measure.metrology
Provides metrology support for measurements with uncertainty.
org.jscience.measure.quantity
Provides quantity types for the units and measures framework.
org.jscience.physics.classical.mechanics
 
org.jscience.physics.classical.thermodynamics
 
org.jscience.physics.classical.waves

    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    Quantity<Q extends Quantity<Q>>
    A physical quantity combining a numerical value with a unit of measurement.
    class 
    StandardUnit<Q extends Quantity<Q>>
    Standard implementation of Unit.
    interface 
    Unit<Q extends Quantity<Q>>
    A unit of measurement for a physical quantity.
